priorVersion.title: CDISC SDTM PK Unit of Measure Kilogram Weight Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C128683

self.title: CDISC SDTM PK Unit of Measure Kilogram Weight Terminology

definition: Units of measure for pharmacokinetic parameters normalized by weight in kilograms.
name: PK Units of Measure - Weight kg
preferredTerm: CDISC SDTM PK Unit of Measure Kilogram Weight Terminology
synonyms: PK Units of Measure - Weight kg

terms.definition: Milliliters per gram per day or liters per day (flow rate), divided by kilograms (weight) or milliliters per day (flow rate), divided by grams (weight).
terms.preferredTerm: Milliliter per Gram per Day

terms.definition: Milliliters per gram per hour or liters per hour (flow rate), divided by kilograms (weight) or milliliters per hour (flow rate), divided by grams (weight).
terms.preferredTerm: Milliliter per Gram per Hour

terms.definition: Milliliters per gram per minute or liters per minute (flow rate), divided by kilograms (weight) or milliliters per minute (flow rate), divided by grams (weight).
terms.preferredTerm: Milliliter per Gram per Minute

terms.definition: Milliliters per kilogram per day or milliliters per day (flow rate), divided by kilograms (weight).
terms.preferredTerm: Milliliter per Kilogram per Day

terms.definition: Milliliters per kilogram per hour or milliliters per hour (flow rate), divided by kilograms (weight).
terms.preferredTerm: Milliliter per Kilogram per Hour

terms.definition: Milliliters per kilogram per minute or milliliters per minute (flow rate), divided by kilograms (weight).
terms.preferredTerm: Milliliter per Kilogram per Minute

terms.definition: International units per milliliter (concentration), divided by kilograms (weight) or milli-international units per milliliter (concentration), divided by grams (weight) or micro-international units per milliliter (concentration), divided by milligrams (dose).
terms.preferredTerm: International Unit per Milliliter per Kilogram

terms.definition: Liters (volume) divided by kilograms (weight) or milliliters (volume), divided by grams (weight).
terms.preferredTerm: Liter per Kilogram

terms.definition: Days times grams per milliliter (area under the curve), divided by kilograms (weight); or days times milligrams per milliliter (area under the curve), divided by grams (weight); or days times micrograms per milliliter (area under the curve), divided by milligrams (dose); or days times nanograms per milliliter (area under the curve), divided by micrograms (dose).
terms.preferredTerm: Day Times Gram Per Milliliter Per Kilogram

terms.definition: Days times milligrams per milliliter (area under the curve), divided by kilograms (weight) or days times micrograms per milliliter (area under the curve), divided by grams (weight).
terms.preferredTerm: Day Times Microgram Per Milliliter Per Gram

terms.definition: Days times millimoles per liter (area under the curve), divided by kilograms (weight) or days times micromoles per liter (area under the curve), divided by grams (weight).
terms.preferredTerm: Day Times Micromole Per Liter Per Gram

terms.definition: Days times moles per liter (area under the curve), divided by kilograms (weight) or days times millimoles per liter (area under the curve), divided by grams (weight).
terms.preferredTerm: Day Times Millimole Per Liter Per Gram

terms.definition: Days times nanograms per milliliter (area under the curve), divided by kilograms (weight) or days times picograms per milliliter (area under the curve), divided by grams (weight).
terms.preferredTerm: Day Times Nanogram Per Milliliter Per Kilogram

terms.definition: Days times nanomoles per liter (area under the curve), divided by kilograms (weight) or days times picomoles per liter (area under the curve), divided by grams (weight).
terms.preferredTerm: Day Times Nanomole Per Liter Per Kilogram

terms.definition: Days times picograms per milliliter (area under the curve), divided by kilograms (weight) or days times femtograms per milliliter (area under the curve), divided by grams (weight).
terms.preferredTerm: Day Times Femtogram Per Milliliter Per Gram

terms.definition: Days times picomoles per liter (area under the curve), divided by kilograms (weight).
terms.preferredTerm: Day Times Picomole Per Liter Per Kilogram

terms.definition: Days times micrograms per milliliter (area under the curve), divided by kilograms (weight) or days times nanograms per milliliter (area under the curve), divided by grams (weight).
terms.preferredTerm: Day Times Microgram Per Milliliter Per Kilogram

terms.definition: Days times micromoles per liter (area under the curve), divided by kilograms (weight) or days times nanomoles per liter (area under the curve), divided by grams (weight).
terms.preferredTerm: Day Times Micromole Per Liter Per Kilogram

terms.definition: Femtograms per milliliter (concentration), divided by kilograms (weight).
terms.preferredTerm: Femtogram per Milliliter per Kilogram

terms.definition: Grams per milliliter (concentration), divided by kilograms (weight) or milligrams per milliliter (concentration), divided by grams (weight) or micrograms per milliliter (concentration), divided by milligrams (dose) or nanograms per milliliter (concentration), divided by micrograms (dose).
terms.preferredTerm: Milligram per Liter per Milligram

terms.definition: Hours times grams per milliliter (area under the curve), divided by kilograms (weight) or hours times milligrams per milliliter (area under the curve), divided by grams (weight) or hours times micrograms per milliliter (area under the curve), divided by milligrams (dose).
terms.preferredTerm: Hour Times Microgram per Milliliter per Milligram

terms.definition: Hours times milligrams per milliliter (area under the curve), divided by kilograms (weight) or hours times micrograms per milliliter (area under the curve), divided by grams (weight) or hours times nanograms per milliliter (area under the curve), divided by milligrams (dose).
terms.preferredTerm: Hour Times Nanogram per Milliliter per Milligram

terms.definition: Hours times millimoles per liter (area under the curve), divided by kilograms (weight); or hours times micromoles per liter (area under the curve), divided by grams (weight); or hours times nanomoles per liter (area under the curve), divided by milligrams (dose); or hours times picomoles per liter (area under the curve), divided by micrograms (dose).
terms.preferredTerm: Hour Times Millimole Per Liter Per Kilogram

terms.definition: Hours times moles per liter (area under the curve), divided by kilograms (weight) or hours times millimoles per liter (area under the curve), divided by grams (weight).
terms.preferredTerm: Hour times Millimole Per Liter Per Gram

terms.definition: Hours times nanograms per milliliter (area under the curve), divided by kilograms (weight) or hours times picograms per milliliter (area under the curve), divided by grams (weight).
terms.preferredTerm: Hour Times Nanogram per Milliliter per Kilogram

terms.definition: Hours times nanomoles per liter (area under the curve), divided by kilograms (weight) or hours times picomoles per liter (area under the curve), divided by grams (weight).
terms.preferredTerm: Hour times Picomole Per Liter Per Gram

terms.definition: Hours times picograms per milliliter (area under the curve), divided by kilograms (weight) or hours times femtograms per milliliter (area under the curve), divided by grams (weight).
terms.preferredTerm: Hour Times Picogram per Milliliter per Kilogram

terms.definition: Hours times picomoles per liter (area under the curve), divided by kilograms (weight).
terms.preferredTerm: Hour Times Picomole Per Liter Per Kilogram

terms.definition: Hours times micrograms per milliliter (area under the curve), divided by kilograms (weight) or hours times nanograms per milliliter (area under the curve), divided by grams (weight) or hours times picograms per milliliter (area under the curve), divided by milligrams (dose).
terms.preferredTerm: Hour Times Nanogram per Milliliter per Gram

terms.definition: Hours times micromoles per liter (area under the curve), divided by kilograms (weight) or hours times nanomoles per liter (area under the curve), divided by grams (weight).
terms.preferredTerm: Hour Times Micromole Per Liter Per Kilogram

terms.definition: Milli-international units per milliliter (concentration), divided by kilograms (weight) or micro-international units per milliliter (concentration), divided by grams (weight).
terms.preferredTerm: Milli-International Unit per Milliliter per Kilogram

terms.definition: Milliliters (volume) divided by kilograms (weight).
terms.preferredTerm: Milliliter per Kilogram

terms.definition: Milligrams per milliliter (concentration), divided by kilograms (weight) or micrograms per milliliter (concentration), divided by grams (weight) or nanograms per milliliter (concentration), divided by milligrams (dose) or picograms per milliliter (concentration), divided by micrograms (dose).
terms.preferredTerm: Nanogram per Milliliter per Milligram

terms.definition: Minutes times grams per milliliter (area under the curve), divided by kilograms (weight) or minutes times milligrams per milliliter (area under the curve), divided by grams (weight).
terms.preferredTerm: Minute Times Gram Per Milliliter Per Kilogram

terms.definition: Minutes times milligrams per milliliter (area under the curve), divided by kilograms (weight) or minutes times micrograms per milliliter (area under the curve), divided by grams (weight).
terms.preferredTerm: Minute Times Microgram Per Milliliter Per Gram

terms.definition: Minutes times millimoles per liter (area under the curve), divided by kilograms (weight) or minutes times micromoles per liter (area under the curve), divided by grams (weight).
terms.preferredTerm: Minute Times Micromole Per Liter Per Gram

terms.definition: Minutes times moles per liter (area under the curve), divided by kilograms (weight) or minutes times millimoles per liter (area under the curve), divided by grams (weight).
terms.preferredTerm: Minute Times Millimole Per Liter Per Gram

terms.definition: Minutes times nanograms per milliliter (area under the curve), divided by kilograms (weight) or minutes times picograms per milliliter (area under the curve), divided by grams (weight).
terms.preferredTerm: Minute Times Nanogram Per Milliliter Per Kilogram

terms.definition: Minutes times nanomoles per liter (area under the curve), divided by kilograms (weight) or minutes times picomoles per liter (area under the curve), divided by grams (weight).
terms.preferredTerm: Minute Times Nanomole Per Liter Per Kilogram

terms.definition: Minutes times picograms per milliliter (area under the curve), divided by kilograms (weight) or minutes times femtograms per milliliter (area under the curve), divided by grams (weight).
terms.preferredTerm: Minute Times Femtogram Per Milliliter Per Gram

terms.definition: Minutes times picomoles per liter (area under the curve), divided by kilograms (weight).
terms.preferredTerm: Minute Times Picomole Per Liter Per Kilogram

terms.definition: Minutes times micrograms per milliliter (area under the curve), divided by kilograms (weight) or minutes times nanograms per milliliter (area under the curve), divided by grams (weight).
terms.preferredTerm: Minute Times Microgram Per Milliliter Per Kilogram

terms.definition: Minutes times micromoles per liter (area under the curve), divided by kilograms (weight) or minutes times nanomoles per liter (area under the curve), divided by grams (weight).
terms.preferredTerm: Minute Times Micromole Per Liter Per Kilogram

terms.definition: Millimoles per liter (concentration), divided by kilograms (weight) or micromoles per liter (concentration), divided by grams (weight) or nanomoles per liter (concentration), divided by milligrams (dose) or picomoles per liter (concentration), divided by micrograms (dose).
terms.preferredTerm: Picomole per Liter per Microgram

terms.definition: Moles per liter (concentration), divided by kilograms (weight) or millimoles per liter (concentration), divided by grams (weight) or micromoles per liter (concentration), divided by milligrams (dose) or nanomoles per liter (concentration), divided by micrograms (dose).
terms.preferredTerm: Millimole per Liter per Gram

terms.definition: Nanograms per kilogram per minute.
terms.preferredTerm: Nanogram per Kilogram per Minute

terms.definition: Nanograms per milliliter (concentration), divided by kilograms (weight) or picograms per milliliter (concentration), divided by grams (weight) or femtograms per milliliter (concentration), divided by milligrams (dose).
terms.preferredTerm: Nanogram per Milliliter per Kilogram

terms.definition: Nanomoles per liter (concentration), divided by kilograms (weight) or picomoles per liter (concentration), divided by grams (weight).
terms.preferredTerm: Nanomole per Liter per Kilogram

terms.definition: Nanomoles (amount), divided by kilograms (weight) or picomoles per gram.
terms.preferredTerm: Nanomole per Kilogram

terms.definition: Picograms per milliliter (concentration), divided by kilograms (weight) or femtograms per milliliter (concentration), divided by grams (weight).
terms.preferredTerm: Femtogram per Milliliter per Gram

terms.definition: Picomoles per liter (concentration), divided by kilograms (weight).
terms.preferredTerm: Picomole per Liter per Kilogram

terms.definition: Micro-international units per milliliter (concentration), divided by kilograms (weight).
terms.preferredTerm: Micro-International Units per Milliliter per Kilogram

terms.definition: Micrograms per milliliter (concentration), divided by kilograms (weight) or nanograms per milliliter (concentration), divided by grams (weight) or picograms per milliliter (concentration), divided by milligrams (dose) or femtograms per milliliter (concentration), divided by micrograms (dose).
terms.preferredTerm: Femtogram per Milliliter per Microgram

terms.definition: Micromoles per liter (concentration), divided by kilograms (weight) or nanomoles per liter (concentration), divided by grams (weight) or picomoles per liter (concentration), divided by milligrams (dose).
terms.preferredTerm: Nanomole per Liter per Gram
